bug.author: stefanievonk
bug.description:
Describe the bug Tensorflow warnings are raised to the console when importing the flair data and models, even when os.environ['TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL'] = '3' is set. 2020-06-05 13:24:23.260894: W tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/default/dso_loader.cc:55] Could not load dynamic library 'cudart64_101.dll'; dlerror: cudart64_101.dll not found 2020-06-05 13:24:23.261217: I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cudart_stub.cc:29] Ignore above cudart dlerror if you do not have a GPU set up on your machine. To Reproduce Import flair Running it in PyCharm on a Windows machine. Expected behavior An option available to mute warnings to the console. Environment (please complete the following information):
Windows 10, no GPU Flair version 0.4.5 Python version 3.7.7

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
